01b789be-5d55-47a1-812b-979bc8ac75b1.description: Executive IQ is an accelerator program that seeks to deliver highly purposed leaders who can drive innovation and disruption within the financial services industry. In collaboration with the University of Virginia Darden School of Business, Microsoft and PwC, this 12-month program delivers a world-class education that provides both the practical and academic approaches needed to succeed over the next decade.
01b789be-5d55-47a1-812b-979bc8ac75b1.name: Executive IQ Participant

badge_template_activities.title: Nominated by their firm and approved by the Executive IQ Application Review Committee for their answers on the application, work experience and supporting letter of reference. Beyond these indicators, the Committee looked for qualities such as creativity, self-motivation, collaboration, agility, big-picture thinking, community/volunteer involvement and other outside interests.

Candidates are required to have a minimum of 10 years of professional work experience with a progression in responsibilities, often reflected in title change, project leadership, or management roles. This progression indicates the applicant is growing their skillset, recognized within their organization for their contributions and leadership skills, and has the ability to grow into more senior roles.

As a member of the cohort, each participant has the motivation and commitment to complete the program. The Committee approved applicants who they believe will take full advantage of what is offered. Specific areas of focus were candidate responses around their personal expectations, motivations for applying, and their plans to make the most of the program and achieve their goals.

skills.name: Maintains A Passion For Continuous Learning
Proven Track Record Of Leadership And Increasing Levels Of Responsibility

26871492-2248-48a5-97fd-3351c8506fbc.description: Badge earners are motivated professionals nominated by their firms to participate in MMI’s two-year Leadership Pathway program. Leadership Pathway is a program designed to recognize and nurture the next generation of investment advice and solutions industry leaders through a structured curriculum of learning activities and networking opportunities.
26871492-2248-48a5-97fd-3351c8506fbc.name: Leadership Pathway - Member

badge_template_activities.title: Attending MMI conferences, forums, and webinars
Cultivating a mentor relationship with a senior-level industry professional
Completing education and training through an online soft skills curriculum, industry research and special projects
Planning and executing the annual Leadership Pathway Seminar and other program events
Actively participating in numerous peer networking opportunities

b69f936a-6556-45ba-96dc-913c716e7279.description: Badge earners are motivated professionals nominated by their firms to complete MMI’s two-year Leadership Pathway program. Leadership Pathway is a program designed to recognize and nurture the next generation of investment advice and solutions industry leaders through a structured curriculum of learning activities and networking opportunities.
b69f936a-6556-45ba-96dc-913c716e7279.name: Leadership Pathway - Alumni

badge_template_activities.title: Attended MMI conferences, forums, and webinars
Cultivated a mentor relationship with a senior-level industry professional
Completed education and training through an online soft skills curriculum, industry research, and special projects
Planned and executed the annual Leadership Pathway Seminar and other program events
Actively participated in numerous peer networking opportunities

d6a83ff7-ccd8-47c1-a4d0-8a07c1348357.description: Earners of this badge have been recognized as successfully completing the requirements of the Executive IQ Innovation Accelerator Program. They have strengthened strategic leadership capabilities as well as technology and digital acumen to lead disruption, drive innovation and transform business. In collaboration with the UVA Darden School of Business, Microsoft and PwC, Earners have confidence in applying decision making tools and becoming a more strategic, inclusive and adaptive leader.
d6a83ff7-ccd8-47c1-a4d0-8a07c1348357.name: Executive IQ Program – Alumni

badge_template_activities.title: Attended virtual classes and educational events across three terms to deepen and learn new skills surrounding leadership and decision-making frameworks, technical acumen and innovation.
Attended Darden-in-Residence I and II, each a multi-day transformational leadership experience
Maximize personal and professional potential by expanding executive-level networks, development of a leadership action plan, and one-on-one coaching sessions with a certified executive coach.
Completed Capstone Innovation Project, applying knowledge and tools learned to develop a prototype solution to an identified industry challenge.

f2cfbfc6-f176-4c1f-b1ce-1b8a1bdb79ef.description: In collaboration with PwC and Darden, the Capstone Innovation Project was a three-month effort designed to put into practice Executive IQ program lessons taught around technology, digital disruption, leadership and embracing a growth mindset. Earners of this badge were tasked to identify an industry problem needing to be addressed. Earners reflect the best of Innovation IQ and can practically apply tools and methods of innovation.
f2cfbfc6-f176-4c1f-b1ce-1b8a1bdb79ef.name: Executive IQ: Capstone Innovation Project

badge_template_activities.title: Attend a full-day workshop to practice new tools and develop proposed innovative solutions to current industry challenges. Attend multiple coaching sessions during the course of the project with a team of experts to help refine the concept with a focus on Minimally Viable Product (MVP)
Over the course of three months, meet and collaborate with a cross-functional team of industry peers to further develop the prototype by applying the PWC process, including the business model canvas
Successfully submit an initial video pitch evaluated by peers and a final business case evaluated by a review committee detailing their innovative idea using the Amazon ‘6-page memo’ approach.

ddaf1577-2279-456c-80b6-f5c0122a16c1.description: Badge earners have advanced skills that have equipped them to act as a trusted advisor to members of MMI’s Leadership Pathway program. Leadership Pathway is a program designed to recognize and nurture the next generation of investment advice and solutions industry leaders through a structured curriculum of learning activities and networking opportunities. Mentors counsel members and help them learn critical leadership and collaboration skills to assume increasing levels of responsibility.
ddaf1577-2279-456c-80b6-f5c0122a16c1.name: Leadership Pathway - Mentor

badge_template_activities.title: Adhere to scheduled calls and in-person meetings
Act as a resource for information about the industry
Assist the mentee to develop skills and knowledge necessary to reach important career goals
Serve as a sounding board for ideas
Offer support, advice and constructive feedback

eac59c03-a37e-47de-97c6-f3c51b42225a.description: Earners of the MMI/Morningstar Sustainable Investing Curriculum certificate have demonstrated a thorough knowledge of sustainable investing and its practical application to the investment thesis. This includes awareness of the Environmental, Social, and Governance aspects of investing including the risk/return paradigm as well as combining a client's values in to the overall investment equation.
eac59c03-a37e-47de-97c6-f3c51b42225a.name: MMI/Morningstar Sustainable Investing Curriculum

alignments.name: Continuing Education (CE) Credits
alignments.description: Upon successful completion of the curriculum, students are eligible for Continuing Education (CE) credits towards the following designations: CFP®; Investments & Wealth Institute CIMA® and CPWM®; Fi360 AIF®, AIFA® and PPC®

badge_template_activities.title: Completed an online curriculum that include a wide overview of sustainable investing as well as a deeper analysis and application of Environmental, Social, and Governance issues to be considered in developing and managing a portfolio.
Successfully passed multiple knowledge assessments as well as intermittent quizzes to ensure reader comprehension.

49f2da2e-34ff-45e4-acef-d4f46ae3189c.description: Earners of the Money Management Institute's Fundamentals of Investment Advisory Solutions certificate have developed a 360-degree view of the advisory industry. They are knowledgeable in asset allocation, manager due diligence, performance reporting, fiduciary duty, and the varied trends shaping advisory solutions.
49f2da2e-34ff-45e4-acef-d4f46ae3189c.name: Fundamentals of Investment Advisory Solutions

alignments.name: Continuing Education (CE) Credits
alignments.description: Upon successful completion of the curriculum, students are eligible for Continuing Education (CE) credits towards the following designations: CFP® - 4.0 hours; Investments & Wealth Institute CIMA® and CPWM® - 3.5 hours; Fi360 AIF®, AIFA® and PPC® - 2 hours.

badge_template_activities.title: Completed eight online courses that include a review of the evolution and current trends in the industry as well as lay the foundation for an understanding of the various functions, processes, and regulations associated with Investment Advisory Solutions.
The Critical Value of Due Diligence and Oversight
The Consultative Process and Relationship to Wealth Management
Code of Conduct and the Investment Advice Profession
Successfully passed an online quiz after each course to ensure reader comprehension.

8e4cf163-e6f3-4473-adfe-7f31b0993ad3.description: Internal and External Wholesalers who have earned the Money Management Institute's Wholesaler Training Curriculum Series I certificate have developed best practices and field-tested strategies taught by who's who of industry distribution leaders and sales experts. Earners have master content focused on financial intelligence, territory management, technology, and sales systems.
8e4cf163-e6f3-4473-adfe-7f31b0993ad3.name: Wholesaler Training Curriculum Series 1.0

alignments.name: Continuing Education (CE) Credits
alignments.description: Upon successful completion of the curriculum, students are eligible for Continuing Education (CE) credits towards the following designations: 7 hours for Investments & Wealth Institute® CIMA®, CPWA®, CIMC®, and RMA®; Fi360 AIF®, AIFA®, and PPC®

badge_template_activities.title: Developed in collaboration with Wilke & Associates, the 20 modules comprise seven hours of core content focused on high-impact advisor engagement and effective client conversations.
Welcome to MMI Wholesaler Training Curriculum
Foundations: What do Barron’s Top Advisors Want from Wholesalers?
Foundations: Becoming the Trusted Advisor to Trusted Advisors
Foundations: Managing Your Energy for Maximum Performance
Foundations: Key Financial and Robo Advisor Trends to Engage Advisors
Territory: Create a Target Advisor Profile— Who is Your Best Advisor?
Territory: Territory Organization Strategies Using the ARMS Segmentation Analysis
Territory: Leveraging Analytics for External Sales Consultants
Territory: The Wholesaler’s Prep Checklist— Be Prepared for Every Meeting or Call
Territory: Deliver High Impact Service to Advisors— Build a World Class Model
Territory: Power Partnerships—How External and Internal Teamwork Strategies Drive Productivity and Results
Technology: Shorten the Sales Cycle by Leveraging Social Media
Technology: Value-add Strategy—Show Advisors How to Gain Referrals with LinkedIn
Successfully complete the Series 1.0 Wholesaler Training Curriculum for advisor financial acumen and key business competencies.

44bf79ed-e489-4625-982d-2d8b8e7cf7c3.description: Badge earners are leaders within their collective professions who bring a unique mix of academic and practical expertise, knowledge and ideas. They provide advice and insight to ensure the best and most current thinking on the varied leadership, innovation, management and inclusion topics are included within the Executive IQ curriculum. All Board Members are volunteers who contribute their time to the betterment of financial services professionals of the present and the future.
44bf79ed-e489-4625-982d-2d8b8e7cf7c3.name: Executive IQ Advisory Board Member

badge_template_activities.title: The Advisory Board is by invitation only and offered to continuous learning champions who have demonstrated a commitment to advancing knowledge among MMI members.
This person is a highly regarded professional in the industry with outstanding professional achievements.
This person shares their knowledge and experience to provide an important consultative Industry Expert service to MMI and Executive IQ
This person uses their knowledge and experience to understand industry recruitment and upskilling needs and shares this market intelligence
Meet several times annually and serve on subcommittees, task forces or for other related assignments during their tenure to support knowledge exchange and facilitate learning experiences
Validates and ensures a rich Executive IQ educational experience that is rewarding and attractive to the marketplace, converting the education to actionable practical application.

skills.name: Creating A Learning Or Growth Mindset

d69df4ff-8685-4c04-a45c-ffe5d6ffe40f.description: The Executive IQ Sherpa badge is issued in recognition of the team lead and their initiative to enhance the learning experience and networking associated with the Executive IQ program. The Sherpa was responsible for maintaining connectivity outside of the classroom to promote and apply innovation methods and tools and to think about business and leadership in a different way.
d69df4ff-8685-4c04-a45c-ffe5d6ffe40f.name: Sherpa Team Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: This badge represents knowledge and application of Executive IQ learning objectives including effective communication and collaboration, emotional intelligence, and application of strategic leadership tools.

2a91f812-9602-45ab-9f70-66d5f7fe2773.description: Recognition given to members of a team who successfully participated in the Executive IQ program’s Capstone Innovation Project and who’s concept was evaluated with distinction. Cross-functional teams of industry peers compete to design, build, and present solutions addressing an industry challenge. Earners of this badge demonstrate a high level of skill in their concept and final written submission as evaluated by a review committee from PWC, UVA Darden and Money Management Institute.
2a91f812-9602-45ab-9f70-66d5f7fe2773.name: Capstone Innovation Project – Honorary Mention

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete requirements for Executive IQ Capstone Innovation Project.
Project submission reflects significant creativity and original thought in the conceptualization and/or solution identification process
Declared as "Honorary Mention" after evaluation of the team’s written submission of a working prototype and business case by a review committee

1bae2ba8-7027-4f9c-bfc2-1adaf90be19d.description: Selected as a finalist and invited to present their Executive IQ Capstone Innovation Project to a final live judging round to identify the 2022 award winner. Earners of this badge placed in the top 3 of all project submissions. Finalists were evaluated as superior in their project written submission based on 1) high relevance to the industry 2) detailed business case and 3) significant creativity and original thought in their innovation design.
1bae2ba8-7027-4f9c-bfc2-1adaf90be19d.name: Capstone Innovation Project – Award Finalist

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete requirements for Executive IQ Capstone Innovation Project.
Identified as a "Finalist" after evaluation of the team’s written submission of a working prototype and business case by a review committee from PWC, UVA Darden and Money Management Institute.
Successfully prepared, presented and defended the project in a live presentation to a panel of industry-related judges

bd60e7b9-caec-40f6-9d44-a41e6036427a.description: Earners of this badge have successfully presented and defended their Executive IQ Capstone Innovation Project to a panel of industry and academic judges. Teams were judged on relevance to the financial services industry, business opportunity, creativity and original thought, as well as overall quality of presentation and discussion. The award-winning team earns the right to present to the MMI Board of Governors and lead an innovation workshop at the MMI Annual Conference.
bd60e7b9-caec-40f6-9d44-a41e6036427a.name: Capstone Innovation Project – Award Winner

badge_template_activities.title: Initially identified as a "Finalist" after evaluation of the team’s written submission of a working prototype and business case by a review committee. The Earner successfully prepared, presented and defended the project in a live presentation to a panel of judges representing PWC, UVA Darden and the MMI Board of Governors.
Declared as "Winner" after scoring the highest total points after evaluation of the team’s written submission and live presentation of a working prototype and business case
Winner of the 2022 Executive IQ Capstone Innovation Project

133f3ade-5f53-4d3d-9403-f3da6073858e.description: Earners of the Money Management Institute's Wealth Management Essentials certificate have developed a well-rounded introduction to the financial services and investment management industries. This concentrated program provides a foundational understanding of the financial markets, the investment products landscape, principles of investment management, the keys to client management, and elements of corporate finance.
133f3ade-5f53-4d3d-9403-f3da6073858e.name: Wealth Management Essentials - Curriculum Master

Successfully pass an online test with a score of 70% or higher after each course to ensure comprehension.

3bdd7034-4aca-4508-a894-ceb2ef5107b1.description: Executive IQ faculty demonstrate expertise in designing and teaching blended-learning courses to advance the knowledge and skills of participants. Specifically, they increase the participant's capacity to think strategically and to enhance their leadership capabilities. The unique learning experience links leading-edge concepts with hands-on best practices providing for learning reinforcement and practical application.
3bdd7034-4aca-4508-a894-ceb2ef5107b1.name: Executive IQ Faculty

badge_template_activities.title: Faculty members qualify for the program based on their advanced knowledge in leadership, innovation, disruption, digital, AI, ML and other cutting edge topics  providing both academic and business practice perspectives.

Facilitate one or many Executive IQ virtual classes or Darden-in-Residence sessions over the 15-month program learning journey. Thoroughly prepare to facilitate class by developing core instructional design to support one or many of the Executive IQ learning outcomes.
